title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 6.2? Click Here!
body:
Hey all,

New Champion Select and Dynamic Queues are back!

http://i.imgur.com/MFSbAkt.jpg

With the Lunar Revel celebration in full swing as well, we want everyone to break out their fireworks and head to the Rift.  So if you're hitting any roadblocks getting patched up, the steps below should help resolve them.

If you have tried everything to light the fuse but are still just sitting in darkness, don't panic!  Drop us a comment below and we'll be able to help out!

----------------------------------------------

> #***LoLReplay causing crashing in the Loading Screen***

We have been seeing tons of reports of LoLReplay causing crashing in the Loading Screen.  If you are running this program, try uninstalling it temporarily to see if it resolves this issue!

> #*** Client Version Rejected by Server Error***

We have been receiving a lot of reports regarding this particular error:

CLIENT VERSION 6.1.16_01_20_13_46 IS REJECTED BY SERVER

If you get this error after patching, it appears that something went wrong in the patching process that failed to get you to 6.2 (You'll notice that the client is saying it is still 6.1, which is why you are not able to get into the client itself).  We are currently investigating whether this is a problem internally, but to do so we need to collect some logs.

If you're experiencing this issue, get the latest 3 patcher logs titled LoLPatcher.log NOT LoLPatcherUX.logs. You can find your patcher logs here:

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Patcher Logs

Copy/paste the contents into http://pastebin.com/, which is the easiest and fasted way to get us this information.  Copy/Paste the unique URL generated into a post in this thread.  We'll collect them and pass them on to the appropriate teams!

In the meantime, forcing a re-patch should help resolve this issue.  Head over to our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5) to find steps how to do this!

> #***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

> #***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!

> #***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: Game keep crashing at the loading screen after champ select and won't reconnect. Have re-patched, restarted, uninstalled and reinstalled the game. Could really use some help.

Hmmm.....unfortunately, the root cause for why the crash is occurring at the Loading Screen is hard to pinpoint.  There are quite a number of reasons it could happen, and it sometimes requires a bit of digging to find out.

Given this, the best step you can take is to complete all of the solutions in our [Game Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes).  There are a ton of steps in the article, but make sure to complete all of them as they are all common solutions to stop the Loading Screen from crashing.

Reply back and let me know if you're still crashing!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zejekZoV,comment-id=00220005,timestamp=2016-01-28T21:51:37.136+0000)
>
> Hmmm.....unfortunately, the root cause for why the crash is occurring at the Loading Screen is hard to pinpoint.  There are quite a number of reasons it could happen, and it sometimes requires a bit of digging to find out.
> 
> Given this, the best step you can take is to complete all of the solutions in our [Game Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes).  There are a ton of steps in the article, but make sure to complete all of them as they are all common solutions to stop the Loading Screen from crashing.
> 
> Reply back and let me know if you're still crashing!

The best step you can take, Riot, is to hire not even all, but at least some decent lead programmers.
Because it is not our fault your algorythm of patching is shit by design.
Its not a bug when something was poorly designed from start.
Like your launcher.
I gotta say I have to +1 this because I can't connect to my game for 3 hours now.

I'm experiencing a problem similar to this after the patch, except that the loading screen after champion select is black. Have been waiting for an hour or two. Tried restarting and restarting my mac.. Nothing /:

YEP right after this patch hit, I can't even get into my client.    I log in and the new text screen pops up telling me something bout dynamic q and then it all vanishes. Not even a bugslpat.  kind of making me mad. i've restarted comp, repaired, uninstalled and reinstalled.  idk. RITO  please!
Still not working. Don't think the problem is with my pc as many people have reported the same issue. Happens for every type of game, even spectating (i made sure there was no sona when I tried)
I closed LoLReplay and restartet it. Worked fine for me.

I didn't even try this the first few times because I thought there wasn't any way it was that simple. 

Apparently, it was.
I have this exact same problem and I don't know what's going on.

Hey Guys,

We have been seeing multiple reports about this particular error.  While this is an extremely old error (we haven't seen it in years), it appears the root cause is the same -- the patcher failed to patch correctly.  We are currently investigating to see if this is a problem internally with our Patcher Servers.

In the time being, forcing a re-patch should resolve this error.  To do this, simply follow the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5).

Let me know if you are still experiencing issues even after the re-patch!

Not working.  It continues to get to 33% Scan files and then this message:

Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.
                                        RETRY
same poblem bro :/

every time i log in, an error message pops up saying "There was an error processing a message from the server; this may be caused by a number of issues so it is recommended that you restart your client. If it continues to occur please visit support.leagueoflegends.com with a description of the error and what you were doing at the time." I have restarted my client a dozen times and it doesn't go away. :(
Hmmm...this is not a error I commonly here of at all.  Is it possible that you can grab a screenshot of the error so I can look a little further into it?

Having the same problem, from other complaints I've seen online its a mac issue.
[(http://i.imgur.com/iMw4dtf.jpg)]

> [{quoted}](name=Zay the Summoner,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zejekZoV,comment-id=003100010000,timestamp=2016-01-30T01:41:03.438+0000)
>
> Having the same problem, from other complaints I've seen online its a mac issue.
> [(http://i.imgur.com/iMw4dtf.jpg)]

I fixed it on mine.  Go into a spectate game and in the black screen press enter.  This completely fixed my problem.

{{champion:40}}

After patch 6.2 i could just login, and go in champion select. After I had picked a champion and went in loading screen, the loading screen just appeared black. When i pressed Esc i would get back to the client, where i could press Reconnect. Though, this didn't matter. I couldn't reconnect. I logged out and tried again later when the game 'I had gone in' was done, then i could once again go in champion select, but the same thing i described before happened. Can someone help me?

Given that this is consistently happening, it appears that there may be an issue with connecting to the individual game server.  Once Champ Select ends, two different events happen almost simultaneously.  First, your connection to PvP.net (the client) is placed in a sort of dormant state, and second, your computer needs to connect to the game server.  If something blocks you from connecting to the game server, you never see the normal Loading Screen.

In an effort to resolve this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  There are a ton of steps there, but they are all crucial in hopefully resolving this issue.  

Let me know if you still aren't able to enter into the Rift!

Replied this already on another of your comments, after i went through the troubleshoot list:

Still not working. Don't think the problem is with my pc as many people have reported the same issue. Happens for every type of game, even spectating (i made sure there was no sona when I tried)

I left it for over 30 minutes to no effect. Running it as a normal application or as administrator doesn't help as it does the same for both. Does anyone know how I can maybe fix this?
Thanks.
i need help he say to me when i try to log in that client version 6.1.16_01_20_13_46 is rejected by server

RIOT I NEED HELP
the first time i finished patching patch 6.2 it was basically the same thing as patch 6.1 jhin wasnt in the shop for me, the new shen rework wasnt there it was basically like it didnt update, except i got the lunar revel shop.
further more, when i try to go into a game on the loading screen after champion select it either blacks out, says i disconnected, or my whole client doesnt show on my computer screen. 
i tried repair the files, but nothing changed.
i tried it on my other accounts and it was the same
I NEED HELP PLSSSS

To clarify, Jhin is not enabled just yet, and will be at a later date.  Shen rework may not be stated in the client itself, but it should be so in the game!

As for the crashing during the Loading Screen, this may be due to LoLReplay being installed.  If you have installed, make sure to temporarily uninstall it to see if it allows you to get into the game!

If you are still experiencing issues, don't hesitate to let me know!
What if you don't have LoLReplay? I don't have it and I keep crashing at the loading screen too.

It reached 99 percent and said error, i had to press retry....When i did, it started scanning files over and over again....When it was done scanning, it downloaded some files which was like 5 mb or something...When it finished downloading them, it said error please click retry and shit keeps going on and on and on.
Is anyone else experiencing this error? and if yes...Have you found a fix yet?{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

5 hours ago I posted my problem. Scrolling down I see posts up to 12 hours ago and further. I understand with patches come problems and bugs needing to be fixed (especially on a big update like this). I'm not happy about the fact that there's a problem, like I said, I understand. What I want to know, and what absolutely infuriates me at this stage, is that after all this time we've been told nothing about progress (this being to my knowledge and what I've seen). It would help us a lot to at least know that an effort is being made, it's a lot more settling.
Repair the game or follow instruction how to re patch the last update https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5
I already attempted this since before it had been recommended on the boards and to no avail.
My update goes up to like 9145 files scaned and then an error message comes up and says it wont finish the update... what do I do?{{item:3070}}

Joined a game thinking everything was nice and dandy, but as soon as the client loads up for the game, it kicks me out and brings me to the home page saying i disconnected and must reconnect. 20 clicks later, same problem. I tried closing client, restarting laptop, nothing's working. Im repairing right now, my internet is one of the best with ethernet cable. game's probably already half done, this is stupid

I got a leave in a ranked game cause of your update...
I will probably get timers now.... 
thanks riot....

Any ideas or maybe why this is happening the last 2 days now? Glad if you help me fellas :)(i have already repaired and it still does the same error problem.)

I've tried everything and nothing will work, but after a few days, it turns back to normal! But the week after that, I have the same problem. Please riot fix this, it's getting really annoying.
Want to play with my friends ;( {{champion:32}}

Hi,

my patcher get stuck everytime i try to do the last update. I'll get the message: '' update failed please check the logs for more information''.
Well i did this and my log gives as failure discription the following code:

> failure_description: ["Riot::LoLLauncherLib::UpdateWorker::DoUpdateGame: E:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/LoLPatcherLib\/UpdateWorker.cpp(445): Failed to install latest game client.","Riot::LoLLauncherLib::`anonymous-namespace'::InstallLatestSolutionRelease: E:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/LoLPatcherLib\/UpdateWorker.cpp(204): Failure or interruption while updating","Riot::RADS::Patching::InstallSolutionRelease: E:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/Patching\/Install\/InstallSolutionRelease.cpp(479): InstallSolutionRelease failed","Riot::RADS::Patching::InstallSolutionReleaseImpl::Execute::Execute: E:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/Patching\/Install\/InstallSolutionRelease.cpp(440): Failure while preparing solution deploy folder","Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallSolutionShared::CopyDeployFolder: E:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/Patching\/Install\/UpdateAndInstallSolutionShared.cpp(234): Failed to copy unmanaged files"]

The failure identifier is:

> failure_identifier: ["E:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/LoLPatcherLib\/UpdateWorker.cpp|445","E:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/LoLPatcherLib\/UpdateWorker.cpp|204","E:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/Patching\/Install\/InstallSolutionRelease.cpp|479","E:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/Patching\/Install\/InstallSolutionRelease.cpp|440","E:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/Patching\/Install\/UpdateAndInstallSolutionShared.cpp|234"]

So how do I fix this thing. The update did not get interrupted
I could use some help here

Given the type of error you are receiving, it appears there may be some sort of connection issue that is preventing you from patching normally.  Since the patcher has no idea why the connection to the Patcher Servers is being cut, it gives you an Unspecified Error message.

To resolve this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  While it has a ton of steps, the solutions there should get you past this and fully patched up!
I completed every step in the guide and it's still not working. I still get the same message. What do I do now?

Did you find a solution? I am having the same problem and went voer soooo many fixes for nothing because its still the same, with the same error with file path E:/ referring to jenkins workspace... Is it a joke or something?

EDIT:
heres what jenkins is -.-
https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/display/JENKINS/Meet+Jenkins
nope still nothing to show for, i think we'll have to wait for the next patch and hope it fixes itself :S

I am having a weird problem I can't seem to figure out since the patch. on the bottom of my screen if I am waiting for my champion to walk into lane or even minions only on like the bottom quarter of my screen it will get very studdery then stop when it passes that point. its so annoyhing I thought my monitor was going out so I went and bought a new monitor. but still the same thing. change my video card same thing. Is this just a program bug ?

Can someone please help. I keep getting an error to check the logs every time I try updating. I reinstalled it 2 times and tried to repair it. I reset my computer and I tried everything. Nothing is working. I have been trying for a full day now to fix it and it is getting annoying. I just want to play. Can anyone help?
